text.title: Wait to Bring Home a New Pet
text.head: Wait to Bring Home a New Pet
text.p: A pet can mean so much to a family . Whether you are going to be getting a bird , fish , dog , cat , unicorn , or whatever it is , you can love them so much ! Waiting to bring them home can be excruciating , nobody wants to wait and leave their new best friend in a shelter , or wherever they are when they could be home and bonding with you . Sometimes you just have to wait though , this article should help with that .
text.head: Steps

list.item: Make sure everything is prepared for your pet . You want everything to be perfect for when they come into their new home , so while you 're waiting , optimize your environment , and get all the stuff they 'll need . A small dog might need you to fill any holes under the fence so they ca n't escape , come up with where you 're going to put dishes , cages , beds . so on . You do n't want there to be a little confusion and problems when you bring them home , so make sure everything is ready !

Bake some treats for them ! Everyone loves some delicious home-made food , why would n't your pet ? A new bird might love some pudding for birds , or maybe your dog would enjoy some fresh baked dog bones . Google some recipes for whatever animal you are getting , and you 'll probably find something you 'll love to make , and your new friend will love to eat !

Draw pictures , write , or create something depicting them . Whatever you like creating , be it traditional art or Minecraft building , you could try putting together something like your pet , or are excited to do with your pet . Do n't worry about being accurate , just enjoy yourself !

Do homework , or something else you have due soon . Rather than just waiting , finish up one of your projects you have due . Its important in your life to get this done , you 'll also have more spare time for when the pet does come home !
Play and video game , or watch YouTube . Near everyone is entertained this way . If you watch a video maybe one about the type of pet you 're bringing home .

Look at images of the pet . Do a Google image search of maybe ' cool fish tanks ' or ' cat houses ' maybe even ' clothes for turtles ' you 'd be surprised what comes up . Maybe what you find will help inspire something you can do for your animal . Adding how to into the search will help you find a variety of cool things to do .
Keep in mind : they 'll be home soon ! Just keep waiting and being patient . It will be incredible once they finally are with you . Good luck , and have fun !

text.head: Tips

list.item: When waiting to bring home a new pet , our minds are focused on them . So whatever you 're doing , it 's best if it relates to the pet as well , because whatever you do , your mind will probably be preoccupied by them anyway .
